affiliates.name: Avail
affiliates.content: If you’ll be managing the rental yourself, you might like Avail to help with tenant screening/leases

affiliates.content: TurboTenant offers property management tools for landlords including tenant screening and rent collection

affiliates.content: If you’re looking for hard-money/bridge financing for your flip, New Silver is one lender affiliate.

affiliates.name: Credit Suite
affiliates.content: If you’re a real estate investor and need business credit/capital, Credit Suite is worth looking into.
